text: Bazouges Cré sur Loir is a commune. It is found in the Pays de la Loire region in the Sarthe department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Bazouges-sur-le-Loir (the seat) and Cré-sur-Loir.Arrêté préfectoral 16 December 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Sarthe
title: Bazouges Cré sur Loir
